BBEX3.A.IDR.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Indonesia / USD 1 = IDR ... (middle)
Methodology: Until 1997, calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates, from 1998 on the basis of mid-month and month-end buying and selling rates.
Comment on 1998: In 1997/1998 financial crises in some south-east Asian countries.
